```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(tidyverse)
```

Column {.sidebar}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

```{r}
selectInput('xcol', 'X Variable', names(airquality))
selectInput('ycol', 'Y Variable', names(airquality), selected = names(airquality)[2])
```


Row {data-height=650}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Scatterplot

```{r}
selectedData <- reactive({
  airquality[, c(input$xcol, input$ycol)] 
})

renderPlot({
  ggplot(selectedData(), aes_string(x=input$xcol, y=input$ycol)) + geom_point() + theme_dark()
})


```
